# Temporal Dynamics

[Home](../../../../README.md) / [Ontology](../../../../ontology/README.md) / [Existence](../../../ontology/existence/README.md)

## Key Concepts

### Temporal Relativity

The concept that time is relative and dependent on the observer's frame of reference, influencing how we perceive and measure time.

### Temporal Causality

The relationship between cause and effect over time, examining how events in the past influence present and future states.

### Temporal Continuity

The idea that time is continuous, with events flowing smoothly from one moment to the next without gaps or interruptions.
